casebody.data:
Argued January 30, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. EUGENE L. HUGHES (No. C 71-12-3904 Cr), Appellant. 505 P2d 351 John K. Hoover, Deputy Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief was Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem. John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief was Lee Johnson, Attorney General, Salem.

affirmed January 30, 1973

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Foley and Thornton, Judges.
